alert.note: Alert for Dane; Jefferson; Rock; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 20 at 2:56PM CDT until September 20 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Walworth County in southeastern Wisconsin... Northeastern Rock County in south central Wisconsin... Southeastern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 255 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Mills to near Cambridge, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Fort Atkinson, Jefferson, Lake Mills, Milton, Edgerton, Johnson Creek, Palmyra, Cambridge, Lake Ripley, Lake Koshkonong, Rome, La Grange, Albion, Hebron, Sullivan, Utica, Rockdale, Busseyville and Helenville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
